Vila Parisi bụ "favela" (slum) na Cubatão, Brazil, nke ahụ bụ ebe nnukwu ọkụ ọkụ na-agbapụta na Febụwarị 25, 1984

A tọhapụrụ lita gas 700,000, e bibiri ụlọ 1,000, na mmadụ 100 nwụrụ. Ọnọdụ ala nke Cubatão gbochiri mgbasa ngwa ngwa nke ikuku na-emetọ ikuku nke sitere na mmanụ ọkụ. Onye German sociologist Ulrich Beck ji okwu banyere Vila Parisi ("Obodo kemịkalụ kacha ruru unyi n'ụwa") dị ka ihe atụ nke "ike mbibi nke ụlọ ọrụ ihe egwu mepere emepe."na
